products.name: Meteor65 Pro Frame
products.description: Ultra-light 65mm frame for 35mm props. Durable and rigid for racing.

products.name: Fractal 65 Micro Frame
products.description: The lightest carbon fiber frameset for 65mm whoops. Precision engineering.

products.name: 0802SE 19500KV Motors
products.description: High-efficiency brushless motors for 1S builds. Classic whoop reliability.

products.name: RS0802 20000KV Motors
products.description: Legendary TinyHawk performance motors. Smooth and powerful.

products.name: F4 1S 5A AIO FC
products.description: Integrated FC, ESC, and ELRS RX. The standard for 1S whoops.

products.name: SuperBee F4 Lite
products.description: High performance AIO with improved 5V regulator and ELRS SPI RX.

products.name: M03 350mW VTX
products.description: Tiny 5.8GHz VTX with adjustable power from 25mW to 350mW.

products.name: C03 FPV Camera
products.description: 1200TVL resolution with global shutter. Best in class for whoops.

products.name: Gemfan 35mm 3-Blade
products.description: Smooth and quiet 3-blade props for 65mm Pro frames.

products.name: 300mAh 1S BT2.0
products.description: Reliable 1S power with high discharge BT2.0 connectors.

products.name: iFlight Nazgul Evoque F5
products.description: The gold standard for 5-inch freestyle drones. Features the DeadCat geometry for no props in view, powerful XING-E motors, and the robust SucceX-E flight stack. Perfect for cinematic cruising and high-speed freestyle.

products.name: GEPRC Mark5
products.description: Specifically designed for freestyle, featuring spread-X arm design for stable flight and shock-absorbing structure to protect professional camera gear.

products.name: EMAX Tinyhawk III
products.description: The ultimate starter drone. Extremely durable frame, integrated camera, and beginner-friendly flight modes. Perfect for indoor learning before moving to bigger quads.

products.name: BetaFPV Cetus Pro Kit
products.description: Complete beginner kit including goggles, radio, and drone. Features altitude hold and emergency landing modes to make learning FPV easier than ever.

products.name: Flywoo Explorer LR 4
products.description: The king of Sub-250g long range. Capable of flight times up to 30 minutes on Li-Ion batteries. Perfect for mountain surfing and cinematic exploration.

products.name: VIFLY WhoopStor V3
products.description: The ultimate 1S charger. Automatically brings batteries to storage voltage to extend their life. Supports PD3.0 and has a built-in fan.

products.name: VIFLY ShortSaver 2
products.description: Essential smart smoke stopper. Completely cuts off power if a short is detected, saving your expensive electronics during the build process.

products.name: Walksnail Avatar Goggles X
products.description: The latest in HD digital FPV. 1080p 100fps transmission with H.265 encoding. Compatible with Walksnail, Analog, and HDZero (via HDMI).

products.name: TS101 Smart Soldering Iron
products.description: Upgraded version of the legendary TS100. DC and PD dual power input, boost mode for quick heating, and fully programmable.

products.name: DJI Goggles 2
products.description: Next-gen digital FPV goggles with Micro-OLED screens, 1080p transmission, and head tracking. The immersive experience for O3 Air Unit fleets.

products.name: Fat Shark Dominator HD
products.description: Walksnail Avatar compatible digital goggles offering 1080p OLED clarity and high refresh rates. Trusted form factor with modern tech.

products.name: Skyzone SKY04X
products.description: Top-tier analog goggles with 1280x960 OLED displays and the legendary SteadyView receiver for breakup-free analog video.

products.name: Eachine EV800D
products.description: The best value starter goggles. Box style screen detaches to become a standalone monitor. True diversity reception for solid signal.

products.name: RadioMaster TX16S MKII
products.description: The industry standard. EdgeTX pre-installed, hall effect gimbals, huge color touch screen, and internal ELRS module options.

products.name: RadioMaster Boxer
products.description: Perfect balance of size and ergonomics. Features 1W internal ELRS for extreme range and full-size gimbals in a compact form factor.

products.name: RadioMaster Pocket
products.description: Ultra-portable gamepad style radio with folding sticks. Fits in your pocket but packs full EdgeTX power and ELRS.

products.name: TBS Tango 2
products.description: The remote that changed the game. Integrated Crossfire for reliable long-range control. Premium build quality and super compact folding antenna.

products.name: ISDT 608AC Charger
products.description: Versatile smart charger with detachable AC power supply. Charges up to 6S batteries. A must-have for the field bench.

products.name: Pinecil Smart Soldering Iron
products.description: Portable RISC-V soldering iron. Heats up in seconds via USB-C or LiPo power. Essential for field repairs.

products.name: iFixit Mako Driver Kit
products.description: The standard analysis kit. Contains every bit you need for drone repair including Torx, Hex (1.5mm, 2.0mm, 2.5mm), and Phillips.

products.name: Lykus Backpack
products.description: Water-resistant hard shell backpack with customizable dividers. Fits goggles, radio, and multiple drones safely.

products.name: Torvol Landing Pad
products.description: Keep your motors clean from dust and grass. Weighted corners ensure it stays put during powerful prop wash takeoffs.

products.name: DJI O3 Air Unit
products.description: No description available.

products.name: BetaFPV Meteor75 Pro
products.description: No description available.
